break_out.model

Class Ball

  • java.lang.Object
    • break_out.model.Ball

  • public class Ball
extends java.lang.Object
    A class that contains the configurations of the ball position and ball movement direction
    Author:
    Mostafa Othman, Azad Juma

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Ball()
      Constructor the ball, setting the start position in bottom-center of the window and sitting a static direction
      Ball(Position pos, Vector2D direction)
      Constructor the ball position and movement direction

      To check whithen the ball hits the baddle
      boolean hitsStone(Stone[] stone)
      boolean function to check whether the ball hits the stone or not, and if so, the shockedStones array will be filled with the shocked stones.
      void reactOnBorder()
      check the ball position, whether it reached to the limits of the screen's border and flips the the movement if so.

      • hitsStone

        public boolean hitsStone(Stone[] stone)
        boolean function to check whether the ball hits the stone or not, and if so, the shockedStones array will be filled with the shocked stones.
        Parameters:
        stone - as a Stones array.
        Returns:
        true if the ball at least shock one stone, and false if not.
